The pure class interface. 
public class FormatLine
  extends CompoundFormat
This is a compound Format class for component Format texts that should either be printed into one line (if they all would fit into that line) or beneath each other.

This behaviour is especially useful for lists of items that are quite complex, so it would not be wise to print several of them into one line for more than one line, since that could lead to confusion for the reader.

Author:
Jacob Wieland (ughosage@cs.tu-berlin.de)
See also:
CompoundFormat, Format
